summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1401, for the improvement of Temple Place, in the City of Seattle, from East Cherry Street to the south line of Tract J of the S. B. Yesler Tracts, by grading the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon together with wooden curbs and gutters and cross walks, under Ordinance No. 15277 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
